name: Dysto
description:
Navigate beatiful puzzles, armed with only a freeze ray. 

Controls
- Arrows, WASD or Left Joystick to move.
- Space / A to fire.
- R / Select to restart a level.
- Ctrl+Shift+R to reset save data.

Game made in two weeks from scratch by
JUSTCAMH- Programming, Art and Game Design.
ClockMaker - Music and Sound Effects.

Note: Some game elements have a strong strobing effect, that may affect individuals with epilepsy.
